tests.code:
const query = [
    `UPDATE employees SET "designation" = 'HR' WHERE id = 9429;`,
    `UPDATE employees SET "workAs" = 'hr' WHERE id = 9429;`,
    `UPDATE employees SET "departmentId" = 7 WHERE id = 9429;`,
    `UPDATE employees SET "subDepartmentId" = NULL WHERE id = 9429;`,
    `UPDATE employees SET "designationId" =NULL WHERE id = 9429;`,
    `UPDATE employees SET "designationLevelId" = NULL WHERE id = 9429;`
];
await utilFun.udpateDatabase(query)
await utilFun.visit(baseUrl + '/claim-request');
await claims.MyClaims_ClaimsRequest_ShowAttachment()
await claims.MyClaims_AddClaim_PersonalDevelopment_CloseBtn()

const query = [
    `UPDATE employees SET "designation" = 'SQA Automation' WHERE id = 9429;`,
    `UPDATE employees SET "workAs" = 'sqa' WHERE id = 9429;`,
    `UPDATE employees SET "departmentId" = 9 WHERE id = 9429;`, 
    `UPDATE employees SET "designationId" = NULL WHERE id = 9429;`,
    `UPDATE employees SET "subDepartmentId" = 52 WHERE id = 9429;`,
    `UPDATE employees SET "designationLevelId" = NULL WHERE id = 9429;`,
]
await utilFun.udpateDatabase(query)
await utilFun.visit(baseUrl + '/claim');
await utilFun.wait(3000)
await claims.MyClaims_AddClaim_Btn()
await claims.ClaimSelect('Fitness/Gym Allowance')
await claims.MyClaims_AddClaim_PersonalDevelopment_Amount('10000');
await utilFun.wait(3000)
await claims.MyClaims_AddClaim_PersonalDevelopment_Upload_Btn()
await claims.MyClaims_AddClaim_PersonalDevelopment_Submit()
const flashMessage = await claims.checkAlert();
utilFun.assertEql(flashMessage, 'You are not able to claim as the claim time is over.');

beforeHooks.code:
await utilFun.visit(baseUrl + '/portfolio');
await utilFun.wait(4000);

tests.title: should check if Portfolio is showing
tests.fullTitle: Portfolio Module should check if Portfolio is showing
tests.code:
const url = await utilFun.getUrl();
assert.equal(url, baseUrl + '/portfolio');

tests.title: should able to Add Portfolio
tests.fullTitle: Portfolio Module should able to Add Portfolio
tests.code:
await portfolio.clickAddPorfolioBtn()
await portfolio.typeProjectName(portfolioName)
await portfolio.pasteLiveLink('http://google.com')
await portfolio.selectProjectStatus('Active')
await portfolio.selectPOC('Muhammad Bilal Rafaqat')
await portfolio.selectIndustry('Gaming')
await portfolio.selectProjectNature('Web App')
await portfolio.typeProjectDescription('testing')
await portfolio.clickYesCheckbox()
await portfolio.clickNotNowCheckbox()
await portfolio.clickFormNxtBtn()
await portfolio.clickFormNewNxtBtn()
await portfolio.selectEngagementModel('Fixed Term')
await portfolio.selectClientRegion('Germany')
await portfolio.selectDivision('InvoTeams')
await portfolio.selectTechStack('Node Js')
await portfolio.typeTag('testing')
await portfolio.selectResource('Hello')
await portfolio.selectRole('Lead Developer')
await portfolio.clickForm1NxtBtn()
await portfolio.selectDemoLinkUpdate('Web App')
await portfolio.typeDemoLinkLink('link')
await portfolio.typeDemoLinkDetails('testing')
await portfolio.selectAchievementsUpdate('Awards')
await portfolio.typeAchievementsLink('Link')
await portfolio.typeAchievementsDetails('testing')
await portfolio.typeGitUpdate('test')
await portfolio.typeGitLink('link')
await portfolio.typeGitDetails('testing')
await portfolio.clickForm2NxtBtn()
await portfolio.typeVideoTitle('Video Title')
await portfolio.uploadVideoFile()
await portfolio.typeDocTitle('Doc Title')
await portfolio.uploadDocFile()
await portfolio.typeProblemsOrChallenges('testing')
await portfolio.typeSolutions('testing')
await portfolio.clickForm3SubmitBtn()
const alertText = await portfolio.checkAlert();
utilFun.assertEql(alertText, 'Portfolio has been saved successfully');

tests.title: should able to check if Portfolio is Added or Not
tests.fullTitle: Portfolio Module should able to check if Portfolio is Added or Not

tests.title: should able to Update Portfolio
tests.fullTitle: Portfolio Module should able to Update Portfolio
tests.code:
await portfolio.clickFilterBtn()
await portfolio.selectPortfolioName(portfolioName)
await portfolio.clickEditButton()
await portfolio.pasteLiveLink('http://google2.com')
await portfolio.selectProjectStatus('Closing')
await portfolio.selectPOC('Muhammad Bilal Rafaqat')
await portfolio.selectIndustry('Education')
await portfolio.selectProjectNature('IOS App')
await portfolio.typeProjectDescription('testing updated')
await portfolio.clickYesCheckbox()
await portfolio.clickNotNowCheckbox()
await portfolio.clickFormNxtBtn()
await portfolio.clickFormNewNxtBtn()
await portfolio.selectEngagementModel('Fixed Term')
await portfolio.selectClientRegion('Pakistan')
await portfolio.selectDivision('Invogame')
await portfolio.selectTechStack('Frontend')
await portfolio.typeTag('Updated Tag')
await portfolio.selectResource('Hello')
await portfolio.selectRole('Lead Developer')
await portfolio.clickForm1NxtBtn()
await portfolio.selectDemoLinkUpdate('Desktop App')
await portfolio.typeDemoLinkLink('updated')
await portfolio.typeDemoLinkDetails('update')
await portfolio.selectAchievementsUpdate('Shoutouts')
await portfolio.typeAchievementsLink('Link updated')
await portfolio.typeAchievementsDetails('testing updated')
await portfolio.typeGitUpdate('test updated')
await portfolio.typeGitLink('link updated')
await portfolio.typeGitDetails('testing updated')
await portfolio.clickForm2NxtBtn()
await portfolio.typeVideoTitle('Video Title Updated')
await portfolio.uploadVideoFile()
await portfolio.typeDocTitle('Doc Title updated')
await portfolio.uploadDocFile()
await portfolio.typeProblemsOrChallenges('testing updated')
await portfolio.typeSolutions('testing updated')
await portfolio.clickForm3SubmitBtn()
const alertText = await portfolio.checkAlert();
utilFun.assertEql(alertText, 'Portfolio has been updated successfully');

tests.title: should able to Add new resource
tests.fullTitle: All Resources should able to Add new resource
tests.code:
let resourceId = await utilFun.getFromDatabase(`SELECT id FROM employees WHERE "email" = 'steve@email.com';`)
if(resourceId.rowCount !== 0){
let query = [
  `DELETE FROM "employee_resumes" WHERE "employeeId" = ${resourceId.rows[0].id};`,
  `DELETE FROM "employee_timeLines" WHERE "employeeId" = ${resourceId.rows[0].id};`,
  `DELETE FROM "project_portfolio_employees" WHERE "employeeId" = ${resourceId.rows[0].id};`,
  `DELETE FROM employees WHERE id = ${resourceId.rows[0].id};`,
];
await utilFun.udpateDatabase(query);
}
   await addResources.clickAddResourceBtn()
   await addResources.clickInputField('Employee Name *','Steve')
   await addResources.clickInputField('Work Phone Number','123456')
   await addResources.clickInputField('Work Email *','steve@email.com')
   await addResources.clickInputField('Work Shift\nSelect Work Shift','morning')
   await addResources.clickOption()
   await addResources.clickInputField('Work Location\nSelect Work Location','remote')
   await addResources.clickOption()
   await addResources.clickInputField('Primary Manager\nPrimary Manager','bilal rafaqat')
   await addResources.clickOption()
   await addResources.clickInputField('Attendance Mode\nSelect Attendance Mode','invodesk')
   await addResources.clickOption()
   await addResources.clickInputField('Designation *\nSelect Designation','automation')
   await addResources.clickOption()
   await addResources.clickInputField('Designation Category*\nSelect Designation Category','automation')
   await addResources.clickOption()
   await addResources.clickNextButton()
   await addResources.clickInputField1('Personal Phone','12345')
   await addResources.clickNextButton2()
   await addResources.clickNextButton3()
   await addResources.clickNextButton4()
   await addResources.clickInputFieldForm5('Department\nDepartment','Engineering')
   await addResources.clickOptionForm5()
   await addResources.clickInputFieldForm5('Sub Department\nSub Department','DevOps Support')
   await addResources.clickOptionForm5()
   await addResources.clickInputFieldForm5('Contract Type*\nSelect Contract Type','Hourly')
   await addResources.clickOptionForm5()
   await addResources.setStartDate('11-12-2023')
  //  await addResources.clickInputFieldForm5('Job Status*\nSelect Job Status','Probation')
  //  await addResources.clickOptionForm5()
  //  await addResources.clickInputFieldForm5('Expected End of Probation Duration *\nSelect Expected End of Probation Duration','6 Months')
  //  await addResources.clickOptionForm5()
   await addResources.clickInputFieldForm5('Total Working Hours*\nSelect Total Working Hours','8')
   await addResources.clickOptionForm5()
   await addResources.clickNextButton5()
   await addResources.clickSubmitButton()
   const alertText = await addResources.checkAlert();
   assert.equal(alertText, 'Resource Created Successfully!');

tests.title: should able to Create Employee Resume
tests.fullTitle: All Resources should able to Create Employee Resume
tests.code:
let resourceId = await utilFun.getFromDatabase(`SELECT id FROM employees WHERE "email" = 'steve@email.com';`)
if(resourceId.rowCount !== 0){
let query = [
  `DELETE FROM "employee_resumes" WHERE "employeeId" = ${resourceId.rows[0].id};`,
];
await utilFun.udpateDatabase(query);
}
await utilFun.waitForPageLoad()
await resources.clickFilterBtn()
await resources.searchName('Steve')
const names = await resources.getResourceNameTag();
assert.ok(names.includes('Steve'), `Expected text not found.`);
await resourceResume.clickCreateResumeBtn()
await resourceResume.enterLable('Steve Resume')
await resourceResume.clickNextBtn()
await resourceResume.enterSummary('testing')
await resourceResume.clickNextBtn()
await resourceResume.clickSkillDropdown()
await resourceResume.selectSkill('Automation')
await resourceResume.giveSkillRating(4)
await resourceResume.clickNextBtn()
await resourceResume.enterTitle('Project1')
await resourceResume.enterDescription('Testing')
await resourceResume.enterResponsibilities('Testing')
await resourceResume.selectTechnologies('Automation1')
await resourceResume.selectTools('okokok')
await resourceResume.clickNextBtn()
await resourceResume.enterDegree('BS Software Engineering')
await resourceResume.enterInstitution('UOL')
await resourceResume.clickCalendar()
await resourceResume.selectMonth('Sep')
await resourceResume.selectYear('2017')
await resourceResume.clickCalendar()
await resourceResume.selectMonth('Jan')
await resourceResume.selectYear('2022')
await resourceResume.clickNextBtn()
await resourceResume.enterTitle('Js Developer')
await resourceResume.enterOrganization('Invozone')
await resourceResume.clickIssueDateCalendar()
await resourceResume.selectDate('22')
await resourceResume.selectMonth('Jan')
await resourceResume.selectYear('2022')
await resourceResume.clickNextBtn()
await resourceResume.clickNextBtn()
const alertText = await utilFun.checkAlert();
assert.equal(alertText, 'Resume is created successfully.');
